verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Make<WH6213> two<WH8147> trumpets<WH2689> of silver.<WH3701> You shall make<WH6213> them of beaten work.<WH4749> You shall use<WH1961> them for the calling<WH4744> of the congregation,<WH5712> and for the journeying<WH4550> of the camps.<WH4264>
When they blow<WH8628> them,<WH2004> all the congregation<WH5712> shall gather<WH3259> themselves to you at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
If they blow<WH8628> just one,<WH259> then the princes,<WH5387> the heads<WH7218> of the thousands<WH505> of Israel,<WH3478> shall gather themselves to you.<WH3259>
When you blow<WH8628> an alarm,<WH8643> the camps<WH4264> that lie<WH2583> on the east side<WH6924> shall go forward.<WH5265>

When you blow<WH8628> an alarm<WH8643> the second time,<WH8145> the camps<WH4264> that lie<WH2583> on the south side<WH8486> shall go forward.<WH5265> They shall blow<WH8628> an alarm<WH8643> for their journeys.<WH5265>
But when the assembly<WH6951> is to be gathered together,<WH6950> you shall blow,<WH8628> but you shall not sound an alarm.<WH7321>
"The sons<WH1121> of Aaron,<WH175> the priests,<WH3548> shall blow<WH8628> the trumpets.<WH2689> This shall be to you for a statute<WH2708> forever<WH5769> throughout your generations.<WH1755>

When you go<WH935> to war<WH4421> in your land<WH776> against<WH6862> the adversary who oppresses<WH6887> you,<WH7321> then you shall sound an alarm with the trumpets.<WH2689> Then you will be remembered<WH2142> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and you will be saved<WH3467> from your enemies.<WH341>

"Also in the day<WH3117> of your gladness,<WH8057> and in your set feasts,<WH4150> and in the beginnings<WH7218> of your months,<WH2320> you shall blow<WH8628> the trumpets<WH2689> over your burnt offerings,<WH5930> and over the sacrifices<WH2077> of your peace offerings;<WH8002> and they shall be to you for a memorial<WH2146> before<WH6440> your God.<WH430> I am Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>"

It happened in the second<WH8145> year,<WH8141> in the second<WH8145> month,<WH2320> on the twentieth<WH6242> day of the month,<WH6051> that the cloud was taken up<WH5927> from over the tabernacle<WH4908> of the testimony.<WH5715>

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went forward<WH5265> according to their journeys<WH4550> out of the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai;<WH5514> and the cloud<WH6051> stayed<WH7931> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Paran.<WH6290>
They first<WH7223> went forward<WH5265> according to the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> by<WH3027> Moses.<WH4872>

First,<WH7223> the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> went<WH5265> forward according to their armies.<WH6635> Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab was over his army.<WH5992>
Nethanel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar<WH6686> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar.<WH3485>
Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon<WH2497> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun.<WH2074>
The tabernacle<WH4908> was taken down;<WH3381> and the sons<WH1121> of Gershon<WH1648> and the sons<WH1121> of Merari,<WH4847> who bore<WH5375> the tabernacle,<WH4908> went forward.<WH5265>
The standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> went forward<WH5265> according to their armies.<WH6635> Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur<WH7707> was over his army.<WH6635>
Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai<WH6701> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon.<WH8095>
Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Deuel<WH1845> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Gad.<WH1410>
The Kohathites<WH6956> set forward,<WH5265> bearing<WH5375> the sanctuary.<WH4720> The others set up<WH6965> the tabernacle<WH4908> before they arrived.<WH935>

The standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> set forward<WH5265> according to their armies.<WH6635> Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud<WH5989> was over his army.<WH6635>
Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur<WH6301> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh.<WH4519>
Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni<WH1441> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin.<WH1144>

The standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of the children<WH1121> of Dan,<WH1835> which was the rear guard<WH622> of all the camps,<WH4264> set forward<WH5265> according to their armies.<WH6635> Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai<WH5996> was over his army.<WH6635>
Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ochran<WH5918> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Asher.<WH836>
Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan<WH5881> was over the army<WH6635> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali.<WH5321>
Thus were<WH428> the travels<WH4550> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to their armies;<WH6635> and they went forward.<WH5265>

Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Hobab,<WH2246> the son<WH1121> of Reuel<WH7467> the Midianite,<WH4084> Moses<WH4872>' father-in<WH2859>-law, "We are journeying<WH5265> to the place<WH4725> of which Yahweh<WH3068> said,<WH559> <WH5414> 'I will give it to you.<WH3212>' Come with us,<WH2895> and we will treat you well; for Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> good<WH2895> concerning Israel.<WH3478>"
He said<WH559> to him,<WH3212> "I will not go; but I will depart<WH3212> to my own land,<WH776> and to my relatives.<WH4138>"
He said,<WH559> "Don't<WH5800> leave us,<WH3651> please; because you know how we are to encamp<WH2583> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and you can be our eyes.<WH5869>
It shall be,<WH3212> if you go with us,<WH2896> yes, it shall be, that whatever good Yahweh<WH3068> does<WH3190> to us,<WH3190> we will do the same to you."

They set forward<WH5265> from the Mount<WH2022> of Yahweh<WH3068> three<WH7969> days<WH3117>' journey.<WH1870> The ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> went<WH5265> before<WH6440> them three<WH7969> days<WH3117>' journey,<WH1870> to seek out<WH8446> a resting place for them.<WH4496>
The cloud<WH6051> of Yahweh<WH3068> was over them by day,<WH3119> when they set forward<WH5265> from the camp.<WH4264>

It happened,<WH727> when the ark went forward,<WH5265> that Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "Rise up,<WH6965> Yahweh,<WH3068> and let your enemies<WH341> be scattered!<WH6327> Let those who hate<WH8130> you flee<WH5127> before you!<WH6440>"
When it rested,<WH5117> he said,<WH559> "Return,<WH7725> Yahweh,<WH3068> to the ten<WH7233> thousands<WH505> of the thousands of Israel.<WH3478>"
